descriptionHtml:
\"King Conan Tribute\"

This is a alt.intro video and alt.main menu mod.

Alt.Video Intro : Friedrich Nietzsche \"That Which Does Not Kill Us Make Us Stronger\"
Alt.Main Menu : King Conan

***Installation***

Use Nexus Mod Manager or install manually by extracting into your /skyrim/Data/ folder...

Alt.Video Intro : I hardly doubt you need a tutorial if you\'ve been using mods for Skyrim before, but just in case, just drag the \"Video\" folder into \"Data\" (if on XP or below), or just drag the whole \"Data\" folder into the root of Skyrim\'s directory and merge its contents (Vista and above).

Alt.Main Menu : Simple extract the .rar folder and select which folder you liked based on the images. Then, open that folder and copy its contents to the Skyrim folder.

Note: I mainly made this mod for me but thought others might like it. 

Comments and suggestions are welcome.

***Uninstallation***

Use Nexus Mod Manager or remove the following from your /skyrim/data/ folder

/skyrim/Data/video/BGS_Logo
/skyrim/Data/meshes/Interface/logo/LOGO.nif
/skyrim/Data/textures/interface/objects/mainmenuwallpaper.dds


***BACK UP YOUR ORIGINAL .BIK FILE IN VIDEO !**
author: wolfpac
